title: The Hidden Trap in the PCI DSS SAQ A Changes
summary: The Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council (PCI SSC) just announced a change to Self Assessment Questionnaire A (SAQ A).

title: Cybercrime Forces Local Law Enforcement to Shift Focus
summary: Local law enforcements need to steer away from "place-based policing" when investigating cybercrimes.

title: 7AI Streamlines Security Operations With Autonomous AI Agents
summary: Cybereason co-founders launch their second act with a security startup focused on offering a platform that uses agentic AI to offload repetitive tasks commonly performed by security analysts.

title: Researcher Outsmarts, Jailbreaks OpenAI's New o3-mini
summary: OpenAI's latest tech can reason better than its previous models could, but not well enough to ferret out careful social engineering.

title: US Cybersecurity Efforts for Spacecraft Are Up in the Air
summary: While President Trump supported federal space efforts during his first administration, the addition of SpaceX chief Elon Musk to his circle likely means challenges for regulating spacecraft cybersecurity, experts say.

title: DeepSeek Phishing Sites Pursue User Data, Crypto Wallets
summary: Riding the wave of notoriety from the Chinese company's R1 AT chatbot, attackers are spinning up lookalike sites for different malicious use cases.

title: Agencies Sound Alarm on Patient Monitors With Hardcoded Backdoor
summary: CISA and the FDA are warning that Contec CMS8000 and Epsimed MN-120 patient monitors are open to meddling and data theft; Claroty Team82 flagged the vulnerability as an avoidable insecure design issue.

title: The Cyber Savanna: A Rigged Race You Can't Win, but Must Run Anyway
summary: When it comes to protecting your company from cyberattacks, you don't have to be the fastest gazelle â€” you just can't afford to be the slowest.

title: Basket of Bank Trojans Defraud Citizens of East India
summary: Cheap banking scams are often easier to pull off in a country with older devices, fewer regulations, and experienced fraudsters.
